titlestmt.subtitle: A description of the collection at Syracuse University
titlestmt.author: MRC

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: Research files on American photography and photographers, including Margaret Bourke-White.

bioghist.head: Biographical History
bioghist.p: Vicki Goldberg is an American photography critic and author. Among her works is a biography of noted American photographer Margaret Bourke-White.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents of the Collection
scopecontent.p:
The
Vicki Goldberg Research Files consist of Goldberg's research files on American photography and photographers. Included in the collection are several boxes relating to noted photographer Margaret Bourke-White and a number of audiorecordings of interviews. An alphabetic index to the tapes is provided at the end of this finding aid.

arrangement.head: Arrangement of the Collection
arrangement.p: The collection is unprocessed and remains in original order.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: The majority of our archival and manuscript collections are housed offsite and require advanced notice for retrieval. Researchers are encouraged to contact us in advance concerning the collection material they wish to access for their research.
Access to recordings requires advance notice to produce a use copy.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Written permission must be obtained from SCRC and all relevant rights holders before publishing quotations, excerpts or images from any materials in this collection.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows:

scopecontent.p: All interviews are audiorecordings, on cassette. Interviews are listed in order by Ms Goldberg's original identification number, starting with VG 001. An alphabetic index is provided at the end of this finding aid. Identification numbers assigned by &scrc_name; are given in parentheses, e.g. "(ID# goldberg_v_001)".

accessrestrict.p: Access to recordings requires advance notice to produce a use copy.
